Package org.gridgain.grid.events

Contains various events emitted by GridGain.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
GridCacheEvent Data grid (cache) event.
GridCachePreloadEvent Data grid (cache) preloading event.
GridCheckpointEvent Grid checkpoint event.
GridDeploymentEvent Grid deployment event.
GridDiscoveryEvent Grid discovery event.
GridEventAdapter Base adapter for the events.
GridJobEvent Grid job event.
GridLicenseEvent Grid license event.
GridSwapSpaceEvent Grid swap space event.
GridTaskEvent Grid task event.
 

Package org.gridgain.grid.events Description

Contains various events emitted by GridGain.
